description: The PB_DTL_TX_INVC_NUM table contains the list of invoices for the detailed premium billing account transaction.

columns.name: PB_TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing detailed transaction.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line counter of the invoice on the detailed transaction.

columns.name: PB_INVC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the invoice on the detailed transaction.

columns.name: INV_AMT
columns.description: Amount of the detailed transaction that appeared on the invoice.
